name: selconj
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: bitr4i(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, wa(w0, w3)), wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, wa(w0, w3)))
-| wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)))
-| wb(wa(w2, wa(w0, w3)), wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, wa(w0, w3)))
-| wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)))
-| wb(wa(w2, wa(w0, w3)), wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)))
-| wb(w1, wa(w2, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, wa(w0, w3)))
-| wb(wa(w2, wa(w0, w3)), wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)))
-| wb(w1, wa(w2, w3))

body.origin: |- wb(wa(w2, wa(w0, w3)), wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, wa(w0, w3)))
-| wb(w1, wa(w2, w3))

comment: An inference for selecting one of a list of conjuncts. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 23-May-2019.)
